storyInfo: The show has come to an end. Some stand closer together, others drift apart.

attributes.content: Here's the pizza you ordered.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Grazie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Is someone sitting here?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Great, glad to join you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I said the seat's taken.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You should go and continue your famiglia's work. Don't bother a commoner like me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm not blaming you, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I don't blame Bernardo either.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If there's anyone to blame, it would have to be me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's my fault I was born into this country and still cling to these fantasies in my heart. I have no reason to blame either of you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm not trying to reason with you at a time like this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I know full well that comforting words mean nothing right now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even though I'm a victim just like you, it's only natural that you see me as a perpetrator.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: All I can tell you is... I still haven't given up.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's all.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There are too many things going on in the city these days. Do keep an eye out, and stay safe. If you run into any problems, give me a call.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Segretario Rubio.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Are you free right now, Your Honor?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Folks on the street seem mighty jumpy.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What happened yesterday was a pretty big deal.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You really gonna go talk to that director?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yes. There are some things I need to set straight with him, no matter what.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It'll be fine. Keep doing what you need to do, Croissant.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll be there. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: In that case, I'll be Croissant's bodyguard for the day!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Thanks. I appreciate it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If things go south, you give us a holler.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Will do.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Croissant, you're thinking about the whole business with Texas again, aren't you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Readin' me like a book, huh?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You can say that again.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm the same, after all.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I know what Sora is thinking. If Texas really wants to stay, she's going to respect her opinion.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And I agree with that.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I still want my sister to meet my friends.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: At least, if there's any way to get Texas out of Siracusa safely, you'd want to find it too, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah... Reckon I can't hide anything from you.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Probably couldn't hide it from those two either.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just like we can understand what Sora is thinking, they understand what we're thinking.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But this is still Siracusa... and Texas is tanglin' with some of the biggest shots in the country. I got no clue what I'm even s'posta do.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh? I thought you would've already figured it out.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Uhh... Speaking of big shots in the country, didn't we meet one of them yesterday?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Welcome, Signorina Sora. Signorina Cellinia.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Why are you dragging Sora and the others into this?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sora's resume coming across my desk was honestly a coincidence.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Of course, it could also be something of an inevitability.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: After all, Compagnia dell'alba is a pretty well-known troupe in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But what most fans don't know is that the troupe's director is actually the don of Famiglia Bellone. That, of course, is a secret.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: After all, I have handed the famiglia's business in this city to my son, and I'm no backseat driver.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Signorina Cellinia, Signorina Sora, I've been directing this troupe for six years.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I hope the two of you can at least believe that my pursuit and love of the arts has nothing to do with my business.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I too would like to see Signorina Sora shine dazzling-bright onstage, if I could, then let the two of you finish your heartwarming reunion.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, you don't particularly care if she does get dragged in, do you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Drop the pretense, Bernardo.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No matter how you try to sugarcoat it, even if meeting Sora was just a coincidence, how could I expect you to care about her safety?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Enough jokes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Lovely, Cellinia. This is the first time I've seen you angry since you got back to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Director, there's something I need to know.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Is the agreement between the two of us still valid?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're talking about—
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: That even if I found Texas, I'd stay with the troupe and continue performing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And here I thought you came to terminate our contract.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What I can do is totally insignificant in the face of the conflict between families.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It'll be too hard for Texas to protect us in all that chaos.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And I trust that you are a man of your word, at least.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So, to cut to the chase, I'm willing to stay here and be your hostage.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Your bravery never ceases to impress me, signorina.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But there's no need to be nervous.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I didn't call you here to castigate you. In fact, what happened at the theater was meant to be a healthy exchange of pleasantries with the Rossatis.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What you've accomplished has already surpassed my wildest dreams.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And so, I'd like to inform you—
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: That the contract between us is terminated.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You're free to go.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: From now on, Cellinia is no longer under Famiglia Bellone's protection.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Is this bargaining chip enough to satisfy you, my friend?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Satisfy me?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You think I'd forget who brought her back in the first place?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: All I want to know is, what was the point of this? From the very beginning?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You should thank my son.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: He was the one who convinced me you were someone to cooperate with.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Leon? Hah, I see.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I've always been optimistic about Famiglia Rossati's development.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Cellinia was just the one who built the foundation for our cooperation today.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: In other words, even if Leontuzzo didn't come to me, you would have.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Like father, like son. Touching.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Heh. I just hope my son can learn a thing or two from your drive.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Listen, Bernardo, other people might fall for your tricks.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But I won't.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Of course, Wallach. I did these things only to show you who really stands in your way.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Oh? Is my biggest obstacle not sitting right in front of me?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: If you think you can get me to betray my donna, keep dreaming.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Perish the thought. No. This is a reminder.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Deep down, you know the truth.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Cellinia's visit has greatly affected Giovanna.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Everyone in Siracusa respects Salvadore, but respect isn't blind obedience.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Salvadore's era ended seven years ago. In this day and age, are you still willing to serve Giovanna to protect his legacy?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You could've soared higher and farther.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The Donna works for the greater good.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Is the greater good she wants the same one you want?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Famiglia Rossati used to dominate Columbia, standing on equal footing with the Texases.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Coming back here to Siracusa, they're pushed around by the other eleven famiglie.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Shouldn't your Rossatis rise above the other famiglie, and drag Signora Sicilia down from Grey Hall?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Stop talking like you know me, old man.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I don't know you, but I know people like you, and I know the look in your eye.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Not a single man alive could ever get comfortable with the stagnant cesspool that Siracusa has become.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You understood that when you saw Cellinia walk out of that room alive, didn't you?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Even if that's true, even if what you say is right.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: That's something for our famiglia to figure out.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Aren't old-fashioned famiglie like yours the most reluctant to get their hands dirty?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Are you telling me this is what Siracusan dignity means?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Wrong again, Wallach.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I invited you here to share an opportunity with you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: An opportunity to overthrow the existing order in Siracusa, and establish a new one.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Why the Rossatis?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Sixty years ago, Signora Sicilia brought back two things from Laterano: 'Guns, and order.'
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Today, people think a unified decision of the Dodici Famiglie created Grey Hall.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But they forget how Signora Sicilia got the Dodici to sit down together.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Absolute power.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Alberto is too prudent, too analytical. He's been cautious his whole life.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And prudence isn't what I need to take on Signora Sicilia. What I want...
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Is a friend who's also looking to overthrow the existing order.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Think about it carefully, Wallach.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: This is the best opportunity you're going to get.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Is the Donna here?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Over in that room.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Go and tell her that I'm going to deal with Cellinia by abducting her friends.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Are we seriously going to do that?
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: What you should be asking instead is—
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Is this really what you want the Rossatis to be?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You sure the guy we met yesterday was all that wonderful?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah, I've got a hunch!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Why would such a heavy hitter be hangin' around this town though?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I think it makes sense. If I were in his position, I'd do the same thing!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hearin' it from you does make it more convincing, somehow.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But how d'ya know he's at the courthouse?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hmm... Oh, there you are.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well, do you remember the last thing he said? It gave me the impression he'd normally be in court, not at church.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Right, sir?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm thinkin'... we should leave him be...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hrmm... Huh?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Oh, it's you kids.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Hello there!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We came to ask you a few questions.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hahaha! Good, good. Take a seat. It's never a bad day to talk to the youths.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: We got a friend who's all mixed up in a contract with of them families. They got her doin' all kinds of things for 'em.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We've been noodlin' on whether or not there might be a way out for her?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Your friend's surname is Texas, isn't it?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I've heard that Bernardo is a man of his word.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: As a don, he must never break his promises.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But even us foreigners can tell all this hubbub is the Bellone family tryin' to rile up Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We... ain't about to go stickin' our heads in all this complicated business. And to be honest, it don't got much to do with us, neither.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But we don't want Texas gettin' any payback from Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Back then, Sicilia's fury towards Giuseppe for what he had done was just as great as her admiration of Salvadore.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Because it was the most direct challenge to the order she had established.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Sicilia accepts all comers within this order, but she will not allow anyone to upend the entire order.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: So what you're sayin' is... There ain't no loopholes in this order, izzat it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I used to think that, my child.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But there are no absolutes, when it comes to orders established by man.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Just as why me meeting you has nothing to do with Cellinia.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: It was just because I happened to meet a fellow Sankta here.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Heehee~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Before Sicilia, the land of Siracusa was not without order.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: The only difference is the order that the families believed in came from themselves, and as no two famiglie could ever share the same order, they could only fight.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Sicilia's actions did not completely break this order.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Instead, it unified the orders among different families into a single, universal standard.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: All the families were united into one.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: And thus, Siracusa became Siracusa.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Now tell me, do you know what this means?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Yer sayin'... Siracusa, before n' after Signora Sicilia... never actually changed?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Clever girl.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: The problems that existed in Siracusa in the past still exist today. I, no, we, are all aware of this fact.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But all these problems can be resolved by seeing Sicilia's fold.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Meetin' Signora Sicilia... that's a tall order.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That is one thing I will not help you with.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But, for her, there might be a way.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: However—
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: However?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The price may be too high to pay.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Donna?
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You've been staring at that necklace in your hand since last night.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: This is a symbol of trust given to me by Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: For picking up the pieces of Famiglia Texas, and leading the Columbian famiglie back to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Oh, it must be pretty valuable.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Are you gonna use it to help, somehow?
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: I'm still on the fence.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You said Wallach plans to attack Cellinia's friends?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Yes. They stepped out a while ago, but when they get back, we'll have an ambush in place.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: To buy some chocolate.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk. Turns out, your guess was right on the money.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Rossati associates have already started to infiltrate the block.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: When those ladies from Penguin Logistics get back, I'm afraid they're gonna die a gruesome death.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But, lemme ask you a question, Lappland.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Lay it on me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I figured the Rossatis would try to rub out Texas.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But you're still a Saluzzo. You really need to send Gambino after that Sankta while you stay here and house-sit for 'em?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I never knew you were to give so much for the sake of friendship.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Am I that type?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Definitely not.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Which is why I want to know, what the hell are you waitin' for?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You plowed that truck right into the courtroom, turned yourself in, and cleared her name in the process. Then you went on and forced the Saluzzos and Bellones together.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I got no clue why the two famiglie actually started working together. But there's gotta be another reason for it, right? You know that by helping the Bellones, you're also helpin' her.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: And that's before we talk about how you gave her a hand in yesterday's assassination.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You say you wanna prove to her that Siracusa's a swamp you can't escape.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But it looks to me like you're tryin' to help her escape.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: If I need to kill a few of her loved ones, or do something to piss her off, just to prove my point...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: All that would show is how paranoid I am. Wouldn't get anywhere with that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If it's real, if it's a fact, then it'll happen, even if I just stood by and watched.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But actually, even that isn't good enough.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I can't just get out of her way, I have to give her enough help so that in the end, she has to finally admit—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That all her struggling was for nothing.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And doing it like that will bring you some satisfaction?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Dunno. All I do know is there's no other way.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So basically, you don't know what to do either.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Yep. And I never said I did.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And you, Capone, you should be more like Gambino and realize that you'll never get the answer you want from me about the two of you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You already knew, huh.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: He wants to stage his comeback by joining up with the Bellones, but what about you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're still standing here. Do you seriously think you're my vassal?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or, are you hoping there's enough room for you on my path?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Give up that hope, or I'll kill you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There's only room for one.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What about Texas?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Texas... might just be the path itself.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Capone stays silent for a minute before turning and leaving.
Ahh, what a pleasant surprise.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I haven't been here before... but it looks like I'm in the right place.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: So this is Penguin Logistics's little stronghold.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Miss Caterina.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sora... Oh, right, I gave you my number before.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Would it be better if I called you Miss Giovanna?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Caterina will do just fine.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I like the name.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Do all Siracusan mobsters like to work in the performing arts?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Why not? We can't be fighting and killing each other all the time.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Are you all together right now?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Miss Caterina?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Never mind.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Sora, would you mind telling me more about your Penguin Logistics?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: For example, how it came to be, and how Cellinia joined.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I'm not too clear on the details myself. After all, Penguin Logistics was already a thing by the time Texas saved me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The boss mentioned a few times how he set up Penguin Logistics after he met Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But when it comes to stuff that happened after I joined, I could talk for days about that.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We've been living together for years.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: *sigh*... I'd really love to chat with you more, if we get the chance.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: There's a lot I'd like to tell you about Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I also want to hear more from you about her life in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: If you ever get a chance to drop by Lungmen, we'd be glad to show you around.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You're not worried about my business?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: What matters is you were once Texas's best friend.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Cellinia truly is blessed to have met a woman as kind as you in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: If you ask me, she's blessed to have a friend like you in Siracusa who's always thinking of her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh right, Sora.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I had a flash of inspiration just now.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm always thinking about how I want the grand finale to play out.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: In my story, I thought she should meet her end just like a Siracusan would.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Surrounded, in a narrow alley, incinerated by a car bomb, so on, so forth.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: These little excerpts from reality are so overused that they've turned into their own tropes.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I want to escape the tropes, and in this story, have her become the least Siracusan Siracusan.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I've been trying to find a 'Siracusan' archetype, but haven't been able to define it.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: That's the source of my writer's block.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But right now, it's starting to come to me.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: There are no Siracusans.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Cellinia Texas finally disappeared in the conflagration, and nobody knew what became of her.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Miss Caterina, are you...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll be back later. I have some presents for you girls.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Wallach, if memory serves me right, you're trying to kidnap Cellinia's friends?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: They're not even back yet, and you've gathered a whole mob?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I would have, if you didn't show up.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I'm extremely disappointed, Donna. No, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Were you that impatient with me?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: It's not a question of patience. It's just, why should we wait?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Why should we have to sit here and wait for the blessing of some antique?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: We followed you to this country, waiting to become masters of this land.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: And now, we have an opportunity.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Are you so sure? You're certain victory is within your grasp?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Nope. I'm not even certain I can deal with that antique...
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But I know Bellone really wants to bring us into a new age.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: And I've got a hankering to make a big bet.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: How many are willing to follow you?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Seventy percent.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: What about the rest?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I'll convince them.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Or, you could do it for me.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: If you decide to change your mind, Giovanna, you're still our boss.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Looks like I brought up some good soldiers after all.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Sorry, Wallach.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Is Texas more important to you than Famiglia Rossati?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I just... don't think this is how things should play out.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The way I see it, some things can only play out like this.
attributes.name: Wallach
